tasks.label: Version: Bump
args: set -e; V='${input:newVersion}'; if ! [[ "$V" =~ ^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then echo "Invalid version: $V"; exit 1; fi; sed -i -E "s/(AppVersion[[:space:]]*=[[:space:]]*\")([^\"]+)(\")/\1${V}\3/" internal/constants/constants.go; sed -i -E "s/(\"productVersion\"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*\")([^\"]+)(\")/\1${V}\3/" wails.json; echo "Bumped to $V";
tasks.detail: Prompt for a version and update AppVersion (Go) and wails.json info.productVersion
